info.name: Deacons School API
info.description: Complete API collection for the Deacons School backend. Includes Users, Classes, Levels, Curriculum, Schedule, Events, Hymns, and Contact endpoints. Use the **Login** request first to get a token, then set the collection variable `token` or use the Authorization header (Bearer) for protected routes.

request.description: Simple health check. Returns a greeting to confirm the server is running.

item.name: Users

request.description: Authenticate with phone and password. Returns a JWT token. Use this token in the Authorization header (Bearer {{token}}) for protected endpoints. Copy the token into the collection variable `token` for other requests.
Register a new user (e.g. student). Send as multipart/form-data. Optional: image file for profile picture. Requires: name, phone, password, code, role, classId, levelId.
Get a single user by ID. Requires authentication. Returns user profile (excluding password).
List all users. Admin only. Use for user management and listing students/teachers.
Get teachers grouped by subject. Staff or admin only. Useful for assigning teachers to classes.
Get school statistics (e.g. total students, classes, teachers). Public; no auth required.
Assign one or more classes to a teacher. Body: userId, classIds array.

Get all classes assigned to a specific teacher. Replace 1 with the teacher's user ID.

users/teacher_id/classes
Remove all class assignments from a teacher. Replace 1 with the teacher's user ID.
Get all teachers with their assigned classes. Useful for schedules and dashboards.

Update profile image for a user. Authenticated user can update own image; admin can update any. Send as multipart with 'image' file. Replace 1 with user ID.

/users/user_id
Change password for a user. User can change own password; admin can change any. Replace 1 with user ID.
Bulk import users from CSV or Excel. Admin only. Field name: 'file'. Optional body: classId for assigning imported users to a class.
Bulk import teachers from CSV or Excel. Admin only. Field name: 'file'.
Delete a user by ID. Admin only. Replace 1 with the user ID to delete.

item.description: User registration, login, profile, bulk import, and admin user management.

item.name: Classes

request.description: List all classes. Public; no authentication required.

Get a single class by ID. Replace 1 with the class ID.

/classes/calss id

Get detailed information for a class (e.g. level, students, curriculum). Replace 1 with the class ID.

/ classes/class id/details
Create a new class. Admin only. Body: location, levelId.

Update an existing class. Admin only. Replace 1 with the class ID.

/classes/class id
Delete a class by ID. Admin only. Replace 1 with the class ID.

Get teacher assignments per subject for a class. Replace 1 with the class ID.

/classes/ class id/teacher_assignments

Update which teachers teach which subjects for a class. Body: assignments array with subject and teacherId. Replace 1 with the class ID.

classes/class id/teacher-assignmentsEndFragment

item.description: Class CRUD and teacher assignments per class.

item.name: Levels

request.description: List all levels. Public; no authentication required.

Get a single level by ID. Replace 1 with the level ID.

/levels/ level id
Create a new level. Body: level (number), stage (number).
Update an existing level. Replace 1 with the level ID.
Delete a level by ID. Replace 1 with the level ID.

item.description: Level (grade/stage) CRUD. Levels represent combinations of level and stage (e.g. Level 1 Stage 1).

item.name: Curriculum

request.description:
Get curriculum for a class with optional filters (subject, semester). Authenticated users can view. Replace 1 with the class ID.

/classes/classid/

Upload a single lecture file (legacy). Admin only. Path: classId, subject, semester, lecture. Form field: file. Prefer 'Upload Lecture Multiple Files' for audio/PDF/video.

StartFragment

| classes/1 | Class ID | Any valid class UUID |  
| subject_key | Subject | taks, al7an, coptic |  
| semesters/1 | Semester | 1 or 2 |  
| lectures/lecture_key | Lecture number | 1–10 (integer) |

EndFragment

example

{{baseUrl}}/classes/05134d63-d453-4eaf-ae3ca2b54c6c767/curriculum/taks/semesters/1/lectures/3
Upload multiple files for a lecture (audio, PDF, video). Admin only. Replace classId (1), subject_key, semester (1), lecture_key. Send one or more of: audio, pdf, video.
Upload a specific file type (audio, pdf, or video) for a lecture. Admin only. Replace last path segment with audio, pdf, or video. Form field: file.
Delete a specific file type (audio, pdf, or video) for a lecture. Admin only. Replace last path segment with audio, pdf, or video.

Set hymns for an al7an (الحان) lecture. Replaces existing hymn set. Admin only. Body: hymnIds array. Replace classId, subject_key, semester, lecture_key.

classes/class id/

item.description: Curriculum and lecture materials per class: list, upload (single/multiple), delete files, set hymns for lectures.

item.name: Schedule

request.description: Persist schedule to database (per-class subject teacher mapping). Body: rows array of { classId, slot, subject, teacherId }.
Get the currently active or saved schedule.

item.description: Generate, apply, save, and retrieve the current schedule.

item.name: Events

request.description: List all events. Public; no authentication required.
Get a single event by ID. Replace 1 with the event ID.
Create a new event. Admin only. Body: name (required), name_arabic, description, color (default #3B82F6), icon.
Update an existing event. Admin only. Body: name, name_arabic, description, color, icon, is_active. Replace 1 with the event ID.
Delete an event by ID. Admin only. Replace 1 with the event ID.

item.description: School events CRUD. Admin can create/update/delete; all can list and get by ID.

item.name: Hymns

request.description: List all hymns. Public; no authentication required.
Get a single hymn by ID. Replace 1 with the hymn ID.
Create a new hymn. Admin only. Body fields depend on your Hymns model (e.g. title, content).
Update an existing hymn. Admin only. Replace 1 with the hymn ID.
Delete a hymn by ID. Admin only. Replace 1 with the hymn ID.

Upload audio file for a hymn. Admin only. Form field name: audio. Replace 1 with the hymn ID.

humns/ hymn_id / audio

item.description: Hymns (ترانيم) CRUD and hymn audio upload. Admin for create/update/delete/upload; all can list and get by ID.

item.name: Contact

request.description: Submit a contact message. Requires authentication. Body: subject, message (adjust to match your contact controller fields).
List all contact messages. Admin only.
Mark a contact message as read. Admin only. Replace 1 with the message ID.
Delete a contact message. Admin only. Replace 1 with the message ID.

item.description: Contact form: submit message (authenticated), list/mark read/delete (admin).
